languages.text: "Впредь тебе следует отвечать мне сразу. Я не терплю столь откровенного пренебрежения".
"In the future, you will answer me at once. I will not tolerate such blatant disrespect."
languages.original_text: "Впредь тебе следует отвечать мне сразу. Я не терплю столь откровенного пренебрежения".

traits.locale_text: "In the future, you will answer me at once. I will not tolerate such blatant disrespect."
"In the future, you will answer me at once. I will not tolerate such blatant disrespect."
"In the future, you will answer me at once. I will not tolerate such blatant disrespect."
"In the future, you will answer me at once. I will not tolerate such blatant disrespect."

languages.text: «En el futuro me responderás en el acto. No toleraré una falta de respeto tan flagrante».
languages.original_text: "In the future, you will answer me at once. I will not tolerate such blatant disrespect."

traits.locale_text: «En el futuro me responderás en el acto. No toleraré una falta de respeto tan flagrante».

languages.text: 「今後は{mf|俺|私}にはすぐに応えるように。このような無礼は許すことができない」
languages.original_text: "In the future, you will answer me at once. I will not tolerate such blatant disrespect."

traits.locale_text: 「今後は{mf|俺|私}にはすぐに応えるように。このような無礼は許すことができない」

languages.text: “以后你必须马上回答我，我无法容忍这种公然的不敬行为。”
languages.original_text: "In the future, you will answer me at once. I will not tolerate such blatant disrespect."

traits.locale_text: “以后你必须马上回答我，我无法容忍这种公然的不敬行为。”

languages.text: « Vous me répondrez immédiatement, à l'avenir. Je ne tolérerai plus le moindre manque de respect aussi flagrant. »
languages.original_text: "In the future, you will answer me at once. I will not tolerate such blatant disrespect."

traits.locale_text: « Vous me répondrez immédiatement, à l'avenir. Je ne tolérerai plus le moindre manque de respect aussi flagrant. »

languages.text: "In Zukunft werdet Ihr mir unverzüglich antworten. Ich dulde solch dreiste Respektlosigkeit nicht."
languages.original_text: "In the future, you will answer me at once. I will not tolerate such blatant disrespect."

traits.locale_text: "In Zukunft werdet Ihr mir unverzüglich antworten. Ich dulde solch dreiste Respektlosigkeit nicht."

languages.text: "Gelecekte ne zaman seslenirsem derhâl cevap vereceksin. Böylesine saygısızlıklara tahammülüm yok."
languages.original_text: "In the future, you will answer me at once. I will not tolerate such blatant disrespect."

traits.locale_text: "Gelecekte ne zaman seslenirsem derhâl cevap vereceksin. Böylesine saygısızlıklara tahammülüm yok."
